title: Holiday scenes?
content:
What are the holiday scenes like? For the first and second sem till the start of 3rd sem?  
Like Diwali and winter breaks and all  
Please explain.

comments.body:
You get a huge 2 months of vacation after your third semester. If your in Engineering, this is the best time to do minor courses, if youre in B.Tech, else if you're in other streams you really don't get much if any choice of your minors. When we were in our second semester going to third we got hardly 2 weeks or so I think cause of Covid, not sure about how it is now.

Overall, Holidays here are minimal and you shouldn't expect a lot of them.

Holidays here are pretty low with Christmas being the only one where you get 2 weeks off. Apart from that there's the usual 1-2 days for Diwali and Dussehra. 

PES instead saves up holidays for the end of the academic session in summer, where they give more than 2 months off (about 9-10 weeks).
